mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oauth2.sys_user (id, username, realname, password, enabled, accountNonExpired, accountNonLocked, credentialsNonExpired) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{realname}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{accountNonExpired}, #{accountNonLocked}, #{credentialsNonExpired});
mapper.select: select permission.* from sys_user user inner join sys_user_role user_role on user.id = user_role.user_id inner join sys_role_permission role_permission on user_role.role_id = role_permission.role_id inner join sys_permission permission on role_permission.perm_id = permission.id where user.username = #{userName}
